text: The Delta Force is a 1986 Israeli American action directed by Menahem Golan and starring Chuck Norris, Lee Marvin, Robert Vaughn, Liam Neeson, Kim Delaney, Robert Forster, Shelley Winters, Martin Balsam, Bo Svenson. It was distributed by Cannon Films and was followed up by two sequels. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1986 action movies Category:Israeli movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:Movies directed by Menahem Golan Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in Israel Category:Movies set in Lebanon
title: The Delta Force
